bio: Born in the beautiful city of Ooty, C Hari Nishanth is a left-handed batsman who made his debut for Tamil Nadu in the 2018-19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. He scored close to 250 runs at an average of 41 which included a valuable knock of 35 runs in the final. In a big moment in his cricket life, Nishanth was bought for his base price by Chennai in the 2021 Indian T20 League auctions.
